title: Dan Reynolds
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Dan Reynolds**

Born in Baltimore in 1979, Dan studied Graphic Design at [RISD](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/RISD) before moving to Europe. In 2004, Dan co-founded the Offenbach [Typostammtisch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typostammtisch) during a brief stint as a graduate student at the [HfG Offenbach](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/HfG%20Offenbach). Later, he studied on the [University of Reading](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20Reading) MA Type Design course, where he graduated as part of the class of 2008. Dan teaches typography and type design courses at several German design schools, and works as a type designer in Berlin

[http://www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803080156/http:/www.typeoff.de/ "http://www.typeoff.de")
author: paul d hunt
